items.name: Cheeseburger

items.description: A classic cheese sandwich with sliced cheese between two soft bread pieces.

items.description: Tender chicken burgers with a variety of seasonings and toppings, served on a bun.

items.description: Spicy chicken dish with a fiery and flavorful taste, a great choice for those who love a hot kick.

items.description: A classic hot dog, typically served with mustard, relish, and onions.

items.description: A refreshing fruit salad with a variety of seasonal fruits, creating a sweet and tangy delight.

items.description: Crispy french fries, a classic side dish that complements many meals.

items.description: A creamy and delicious milk shake, a perfect choice for a refreshing beverage.
